resources.string: Hello, please enter your symptoms one by one. When you\'re done type !Done. For a list of symptoms type !Symptoms
I\'m sorry, that\'s an invalid response. Make sure you typed your response correctly and if you need a refresher of the Symptoms type !Symptoms
Sorry! We are still processing your last messsage please try again.
Possible health Issues from most to least likely:
